Name: Lexie The Takeover
About the game: Lexie 'The Takeover' is a 2D platformer that will send you to a post apocalyptic world where an army of skeletons roam, lead by the infamous Commander Bones. Your goal? To defeat the army and Commander Bones himself through day and night to restore some kind of peace in the world and let what is left of humanity rebuild a human civilization. You have been chosen to accomplish this task. Will you be up for it? - 30 Levels of pure gaming fun - NO Micro transactions. You get the full game at purchase.
